channel.description:
Does anybody know how to change the background image of a 525 client, I have looked through most of the classes as good as I could because most of it is obfuscated etc, and I can't find how to change the background image. I have seen it done before on one of the 525 client's but they didn't release it. Anyone care to point me in the right direction?
Thanks..

item.dc:creator: @Projext Projext
